Detailed Description

This class implements equilibration II strategy for origin-based algorithms.

Warning
Equilibration II might not converge in case of high precision.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Parameters
maxNbItermaximum number of iteration in Equilibration II.

Member Function Documentation

bool OriginBasedAlgoEQII::mainLoop ( OriginBush *  bush)
privatevirtual

Performs main operations made during one iteration for a given origin. It implements equilibration I. Equilibration II over-rides this method. For details see OriginBasedAlgoEQII.

Returns
true if current bush was equilibrated, false otherwise. The return value is needed only for equilibration II.

Reimplemented from OriginBasedAlgo.
